turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Id like to place a coffee order for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is this order for the Starbucks on Alondra Blvd, in Paramount?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is the correct store.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: First off, can I get a vanilla bean creme frappuchino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get it grande, and can I get non-fat creme in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a venti caffe misto, and can I get it with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A caffe misto with almond milk, venti size. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me what are the seasonal flavors currently available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks is currently offering two seasonal drinks, Cinnamon Shortbread latte and frappuchino.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Im interested in knowing more about the frappuchino, what does it have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Cinnamon shortbread frappuchino is made with nutmeg, cinnamon, creme, and a vanilla butterscotch sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright that sounds good, can I get a grande size Cinnamon Shortbread frappuchino, with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, the frappuchino has been added to your order. Is that all for your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On second thought, can I change the size of both frappuchinos to venti size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, both frappuchinos have been changed from grande to venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also, can you add two blueberry muffins to my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two blueberry muffins have been added to your order, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is all, can you tell me the complete order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, the order is two venti frappuchinos, one vanilla bean creme with nonfat creme and the other cinnamon shortbread with whole milk. Finally two blueberry muffins and a venti caffe misto with almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready soon, a receipt has been sent to you via text message, be sure to keep a look out for it.
